subject: Re: Order #SSN5762
description_text:
Thank you for the quick reply. When will the order be shipped, or when can I expect to receive my order?
 

 

 

 
 
 
 
 
>  
> Am 07.01.2026 um 09:20, service@simsonn.com  <service@simsonn.com>  schrieb:
>  
>  
>  
>  
> Hi Markus Goldian,
>  
>  Your order is the  ProX Ultra 2-pedal set, which  already includes two VAM Pro vibration motors  and  U-shaped horizontal mounting brackets.
>  You  do not need to purchase additional VAM Pro motors.  
>  
>  
>  
>  
>
>      
>  
> > On Mon, 5 Jan at 4:36 PM  , Markus Goldian  <soldierboy1977@arcor.de>  wrote:  
> >  Dear Sir or Madam,
> >  
> >    
> >  
> >   I would like to know if the haptic motors are included in my order or if I need to order them separately?
> >  
> >  Furthermore, I would like to know about the electricity connection for Germany?
> >  
> >  Is a suitable connection available?
> >  
> > Best regards

> >

>   9975:4206036

conversations.body_text: Hi margol1977,  We will process your order as soon as possible. Due to the peak season, there may be a slight delay in order handling. Thank you for your understanding.Â

Dear Sir/Madam, I placed the above-mentioned order on January 5th, and it has been in transit since January 7th. The shipment status has not changed since then. How long will it take for my order to arrive? When can I expect to receive my order?
 

 
  Sincerely, Markus Goldian
 

 

 

 
 
 
 
 
>  
> Am 07.01.2026 um 09:49, service@simsonn.com

Hi margol1977,    We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible.  Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
